CustomField.description: Formula for record attribution to a certain language skill group
CustomField.formula: IF( Country = "Germany" , "DE", IF( Country = "Austria" , "DE", IF( Country = "Switzerland-DE" , "DE", IF( Country = "Poland" , "PL", IF( Country = "Hungary" , "HU", IF( Country = "Czech Republic" , "CZ", IF( Country = "Slovakia" , "CZ", IF( Country = "France" , "FR", IF( Country = "Luxembourg" , "FR", IF( Country = "Switzerland-FR" , "FR", IF( Country = "Belgium-FR" , "FR", IF( Country = "Belgium-NL" , "NL", IF( Country = "Netherlands" , "NL", IF( Country = "Switzerland-IT" , "IT", "OTHER"))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: NVM Language Skill
